name: pnp-devproxy-minimal-powershell
title: Minimal PowerShell script using Dev Proxy
shortDescription: Demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with a PowerShell script
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with a PowerShell script. It shows how to configure Dev Proxy to intercept API requests and mock responses using the MockResponsePlugin. The sample makes a single API call to JSONPlaceholder and returns a mocked response, demonstrating how Dev Proxy intercepts and replaces the real API call. Perfect for getting started with Dev Proxy in PowerShell projects.
